tool_description: Find any quote in millions of movies and series. All quotes are time-based, contextualized, and linked with the imdb movie database.
name: Movie Quote
title: Movie Quote

api_list.name: movie
api_list.description: Find any quote in millions of movies and series. All quotes are time-based, contextualized, and linked with the imdb movie database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-quote.p.rapidapi.com/movie/so far so good"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-quote.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-quote.p.rapidapi.com/movie/{keyword}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-quote.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
